InboxItems xs example:

```js
const messages = [
  { id: "1", text: "Hello World" },
  { id: "2", text: "Hello World" },
  { id: "3", text: "Hello World" },
  { id: "4", text: "Hello World" },
  { id: "5", text: "Hello World" },
  { id: "6", text: "Hello World" },
  { id: "7", text: "Hello World" }
];
<InboxItems messages={messages} />;
```
